interface.name: kf5_panel_manager
interface.description:
This interface is used to manage panels.
It is used by KF5 powered Wayland shells to communicate with the compositor and can only be bound one time.

request.name: set_panel
request.description: The surface set by this request will receive the panel role. Panels display launchers, buttons and other kind of elements.

interface.name: kf5_panel
interface.description: This interface is used to manage panels.

request.name: set_min_length
request.description: Set minimum length of this panel.

request.name: set_max_length
request.description: Set maximum length of this panel.

request.name: dock
request.description: Set panel position on the specified output according to edge, alignment and offset.

event.name: docked
event.description: Emitted when the panel is docked.
